website_summaries.verdict: Panasonic's Lumix DMC-FH20 is a very good value for anyone in need of a basic point-and-shoot with a midrange zoom.
pros: flexible lens in a compact metal body
very good value for features, performance, and photo quality
cons: Feature set might be too basic for some

customer_reviews.title: all new accessories
customer_reviews.text: Camera arrived in short order. It came with all new High capacity battery, Chargers, both wall, and 12V cigar, USB transfer cable, and even a battery storage case. I wanted to replace by 12 year old DMC-78 that I broke battery compartment cover. It fit in my hard case and is small enough to carry in my Toyota truck small storage tray.
customer_reviews.author: john wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this camera. Can't say anything bad about it. Took a great photo of my disabled dog using 14pxls. Ruff Rollin Wheelchairs for Pets actually used the picture as a blowup 10' x 10' poster for trade shows because it was so clear. Sad part about the camera: I recently dropped it and now it is not working properly. I cried!!! I am buying another one but an upgrade as they have changed over the past several years. I would highly recommend the Panasonic Lumix cameras to anyone looking to buy a pocket camera that does not cost a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Wegienka

customer_reviews.title: Ok camera
customer_reviews.text: It was an ok camera. If I was taking close up shots with the flash, the lens slide out too far and always created a shadow in my images.
customer_reviews.author: Shalimar Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Point and Shoot Camera
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I got this camera I went outside and took the most beautiful pictures of my garden! It is very simple to use, the features are almost totally fool proof, (And I'd know, I tested them well!) and the quality is great. One note, the file size that the pictures download to on the computer, at least for me were HUGE. They took a long time to download, and you can't email or attach them to anything really unless you can find a way to reduce the size. I'm still working on it myself. Other than that it's great. It's sleek, attractive, easy to carry for smaller hands, and just a really good buy for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: I did a bunch of research before buying this camera - and boy did it pay off! This little monster is the neatest thing since sliced bread. The Intelligent Auto feature lets me take beautiful pictures every time - and I am somewhere below rank amateur. It shows things the way I see them, and I don't have to monkey around with lenses and light adjustments. It's much lighter weight than I expected - the heaviest part is the telescoping lens. Use the string to make sure you don't drop this baby. Oh, you will want to read the instructions that come with it - unless you speak pictograph. The only English is on the front of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: ginarex

customer_reviews.title: Lumix
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. I went to a couple of independent product websites to see what the best point and shoot cameras were and this camera kept coming up as recommended, I see why. It is easy to use and takes super pictures and video. The sound on the video is amazing. Pictures very sharp. The only problem I had was the 14 mega pixil, takes up so much space that you have to minimize the photos before emailing them to someone or else they are too big to send. Great size ans weight, works well in an urban landscape.
customer_reviews.author: T. Shiro

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Happy
customer_reviews.text: The only small dislike I have is that it uses a proprietary data cable plug. If you lose the cable that comes with it getting a replacement is more difficult, and if say you leave it at home and want to display photos on the TV where you are at, the likelyhood of them having a cable that will work is almost zero. I wish camera manufacturers would standardize on one interface plug type. I also had to adjust the white balance to get pictures to look right.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Decent compact camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for a parent and managed to test it out such that I can teach them how to use it. The camera quality is good as it managed to capture sharp details but the colors could be improved. Fortunately, the color is something I can fix in post processing. The interface is simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fu

customer_reviews.title: Great little point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for 2 years. It takes great pictures outdoors and fairly decent indoor pictures. You do have to adjust the white balance while shooting indoors, otherwise you will get pictures that are too warm. The image quality is great, but if you blow up a picture to about 16 x 20 then the image gets soft. There is a bit of lag time between takes. It can be annoying if you are shooting live action shots or toddlers that are constantly on the move. Other than that, it is a great little camera for purse or pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera at a great price
customer_reviews.text: After reading dozens of reviews, I purchased my first digital camera. The reviews were spot on. This is a fantastic camera that I purchased for only $125. I used this camera on a trip to Hawaii. My camera took better pictures than the pricey cameras that our friends were using. The 8X zoom is a great feature; with it I snapped close-ups of waterfalls, distant grottos, whales, and banana bunches in far-away trees. I was pleasantly surprised to hear music accompanying the slide show feature when I watched the pictures on my TV. I'm very happy with this purchase and highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Theo

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturing defect
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before deciding on this camera, and this one was the clear winner. I bought it, used it at one car show, and all the photos had a spot on the bottom left corner. There was nothing on the lens, and after cleaning it anyway and taking more photos, I determined there was a spec of metal inside the lens that was causing the spot. I was not able to reorder the camera as it had sold out. I still want it and it's been 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: jojidu

customer_reviews.title: panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20
customer_reviews.text: Essentially I bought this camera to capture images that I use as subjects for my artwork. I was looking for an inexpensive, small, simple high resolution camera that was fast enough to capture candid images. This camera performed excellently in almost everyway. My only criticism was about the time it took to process each image was a little too slow but I think that is becasue it has a high MP rate (14) creating images that are around 1 mb. On the more positive side; the computer interface was very simple and easy to use, the autofocus worked great, good battery life, and it has the ability to capture low light images without a flash
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: We have a nice DSLR camera that we use for everything right now and it was just way too big to bring around everywhere. So after quite a bit of research we decided to go with this camera. It's nice and small, can fit in your pocket and it takes excellent photos. I would highly recommend this camera. The worst part about it is the software that comes with it seems kind of cheesy and not very user friendly. The camera itself though is as good as it gets for a point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Stang

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20K
customer_reviews.text: I got this product just the other day, and I love it! The picture quality is amazing and the camera is so small and compact. I love how this camera has so many different settings and they are so easy to use. Pictures in the dark have a little bit of noise, but that's the be expected from almost any digital camera. I must say, I don't regret this choice over my Sony Cybershot DSC-W370. My old camera was losing it's detail, had some clicking sound in the video, and even lagged when taking pictures. This camera is a great buy and well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bambi

customer_reviews.title: Oh, this is good
customer_reviews.text: Best camera/video recorder I've ever owned, and the price, well, how could anyone expect more from a camera that only cost a hundred bucks? I like it so much I bought another one when Itchy The Destroyer (my border collie) ate the first one. She has good taste, that's all I can say. True, you can't zoom while videoing, but hey, you can't have everything. The video it takes is better quality than any videocam I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: T' Wretched Reviewer With Malice Aforethought

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this model of camera a few years back when it disappeared on me, bought this to replace it and is just as amazing as I remember! The digital zoom is one of my favorite options for I like to take pictures of birds, and you can get up real close with it. Not the best quality picture with digital zoom but for the price I got it at, it was well worth it!! One of the best cameras I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Taea

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a small camera that's nice to have around if you want to capture pictures. I bought it because my last lumix was similar, but my older model was so much better. I stayed with the lumix, but went bigger and better. Lumix is a nice quality camera, but I wouldn't buy smaller.
customer_reviews.author: KristieK

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews and finally settled on this camera. So far so good with it. It is still blurry in low light/no flash unless you have a super steady hand or set the camera on something but I think most cameras that are point in shoot at a reasonable price are that way. 2/14/13 Update: Still works great. It is pretty tough and has survived multiple drops. Still taking great pictures for a point and shoot. Very satisfied purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Miller

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU CAN FIND ONE, BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: (I have a terrible problem with handheld camera shake.) This is simple to learn and takes rock steady pictures using the stabilize mode. Hallelujah! Finally sharp pictures. By the way this is a top rated camera in it's class according to most reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: Dale V.

customer_reviews.title: Luminex Camera
customer_reviews.text: Not what I thought it would be. Does not stabilize the picture as it claims. The video feature is difficult for me to use. The playback of pictures is good. I tried the video feature and had trouble starting it and stopping it. I would have hoped the operation be in the book, but it was on CD, so I have to have my computer on everytime I want to look up a question about any operations of the camera. That is not always convenient.
customer_reviews.author: poodle

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small cheap camera for an event and it did the job. Not the greatest pics but not bad either!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good little camera
customer_reviews.text: good little camera.......still working after a couple years.......handy when you need a little better pix than your phone will take..........easy to use
customer_reviews.author: LG L.

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is incredible for it's size! It shoots amazing pictures and the battery lasts forever! I bought a super fast 16gb memory card for it off Amazon at a steal of a price also. The pictures come out great with the flash ON OR OFF!! Only small complaint, and its minor...Is the videos cut off at like 8 minutes I think and you have to start a new clip. It has an intelligent Auto mode for shooting that actually works right and makes pictures look better instead of worse.
customer_reviews.author: Kapitald

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice little camera and takes good pictures to. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Turns on quickly and takes good pictures. If you're taking pictures at night make sure to use the "night scenery" mode to get a good picture, leaving it on auto makes really dark pictures. Video isn't too bad. Takes very high res video which is nice. Audio quality on the video leaves something to desire, it is really quiet. Also the camera takes video in .mov format(aka quicktime/mac). This may be nice if you have all of the mac software, but it makes it en-editable for the 90% of us who use windows software and don't want to fork over the extra $30.
customer_reviews.author: rocketmann

customer_reviews.title: Hard to figure out!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for the good reviews and 8x optical zoom. The camera works fine but the software is hard to figure out. If your computer skills are minimal like mine, look at Canon which I owned in the past and was easy to use. A very brief operator guide comes with the camera, which is not much help. When I installed the PHOTOfun 5.0 software it you need to go through many steps to get it right. My brain is fried from spending the last 2 hours trying to figure it out and send a email with an attached picture. To NO avail. Good Grief Charlie Brown !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great Point And Shoot!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as we were going to a Yankees game.I have a NIKON D70s but didn't want to have to lug the big camera with the two lenses around during the game. The first I used it was at the game, I was three rows off the field and with the zoom I was able to get great pics of the players and the game. I would recommend this camera for any one who is looking for a compact, easy to use, great zoom,great megapixel, you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: AFD326

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality point-and-shoot. A nice amount of special settings, straightforward interface, easy/fast navigation, lasting battery. I bought this after a month of painstaking research. It was rated highly on Consumer Reports (and others). I've had it for three years and still works great :)
customer_reviews.author: EmiWhoAmI

customer_reviews.title: impressive 8X optical zoom
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my trip to Arches national park. I had a SLR camera but I had a plan for long trekking with some other heavy stuffs so I needed a small camera. It was a good choice for my purpose. Small enough to keep it in my pocket, and 8X optical zoom gave me a fabulous picture. Picture quality itself is as good as my SLR (Konica Minolta). I can't believe it's $150. Overall I was satisfied with my decision.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger Woo

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera with a 8mb memory card and took it on vacation. Great quality pictures, each battery charge gave me at least 100 photos. I did not use the video and haven't needed support so I haven't rated them. I like it because it is small enough to fit in a pocket, not very heavy and takes great photos. Not much more you can say about a point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot camera but little slow!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second panasonic lumix point and shoot camera. Im impressed with the quality and features..only issue I saw is this is little slow..you need to wait for a few seconds to take second picture after you clicked first picture..
customer_reviews.author: Pradeep Nagaraja

customer_reviews.title: Smart Choice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera for the price. Very easy to use. Took great pictures from the top of Cadillac Mountain in Bar Harbor as well as of deer at sunset. Battery seems to have a good life. I took the suggestion of another reviewer and purchased a 16gb storage card. I would recommend this to anyone buying this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera a lot, it's easy to use and takes amazing pictures. The only thing I don't like is that I have to switch "modes" from taking the picture to view them. I'm sure most people are like me they like to see the pic right away and having to switch modes is kind of a pain in the butt. Besides that the camera is great.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pics
customer_reviews.text: This camera fits in all of my purses, even my cute evening bags without taking up too much space. It also takes awesome pictures and has great zoom capability. The menus are a little confusing, but if you take the time to read the manual and learn the camera it will produce great pictures!
customer_reviews.author: carolinagirl2001

customer_reviews.title: Can take great pictures even if you are a novice
customer_reviews.text: The intelligence auto really works like a charm. Was skeptical at first but iA is all you need to take great pictures. Once you learn how to be patient and let the camera focus itself during the shot, any pic will come out looking great. Battery power is great and lasts forever as well. Great looking camera in all black. Only real downside is that its not as slim as some other products in the market (still pretty slim and fits right in your pocket comfortably), but no doubt the best product you can get right now for the price
customer_reviews.author: R. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera years ago and still using it today even though I have a smart phone. It just works much better in low light and takes respectful quality photos.
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Does not live up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on reviews and I am disappointed. I think the zoom is not timed correctly with the flash. Night shots and zoomed shots do not look good. Surprising because it seems to have a good lens. Also this camera has absolutely no bells and whistles, and it's a bit bulkier than I'd like. I much prefer the Canon Elph. Close portrait and macro shots are the only thing it does well. And it does do those quite spectacularly. If you just want something for snapping pics at family gatherings, then this camera is spectacularly suited to you. Or if you love macro shots but don't want to spend a fortune on a good SLR.
customer_reviews.author: Lars SveenTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the go
customer_reviews.text: This little camera takes high quality pictures with resolution high enough to make large prints. Bought for taking pictures at high school graduation,and the pictures came out sharp and focused even in an indoor arena. A little yellowy color, but more because of the location than the camera. Be aware that it has a rechargeable battery, not AA etc. Might want to order an extra. Only draw back from my side.
customer_reviews.author: Beth K

customer_reviews.title: best one
customer_reviews.text: You will never regret buying this point & shoot .. Simply put .. THE BEST ! I liked it so well , I bought one for my buddy after his camera was stolen. Consumers reports rates it the best in class ..EASY to use, takes great videos ...Great computer program comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: A great Camera and Price
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a compact camera for several months. I"ve gone to "Box Stores', read reviews and had this model in mind plus others. After doing my research, I decided on the FH 20. If you follow the basic operation manual, you can't go wrong. The advanced manual is on the disc under operation manual. This is some 147 pages long. I printed only the pages that I was interested in. It sure helps when you want to do some technical settings. I have only had this camera for 45 days, the quality of the pictures are great. Looking for more fun with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great picture! Great HD video recording quality and The price was awesome! Excellent! But if u need something more professional go and look for another camera! I bought it because I wanted to record videos in HD and the price worth it! The photos are great and the zoom it's WoW! It's my third camera and I love it has been the best camera I ever had!
customer_reviews.author: LukasAgudelo

customer_reviews.title: Lumix DMC-FH20K Review
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is easy to use. At first I couldn't get the flash to work but once I learned how to turn off the "BURST" mode where the flash isn't intended to operate, everything worked well. I'm not a photographer so I let the camera do all of the settings. The pictures come out great. I installed a 8GB memory stick. Even at the highest pixil setting of 14MB, the camera produces about 1500 pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Rony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera, I love the zoom and battery life.
customer_reviews.text: It's an excellent camera, very low price for what it does. I really like it and the pictures look great, even the ones taken with zoom. The battery life is very reasonable, you can take around 600 pictures. And it charges very fast, around 3 or 3 and half hours.
customer_reviews.author: cirekcr

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great little point and shoot camera that I bought for a trip I'm taking soon. I tried it out at a concert I went to last night, and it worked pretty well. I wished I would have played with the settings before, because choosing which scene is right for your situation can be a little tricky. Overall, easy of use is excellent. The pictures look great in hi-res format and the video is the best quality I've seen off of a camera in this price range. I will see how well it works on my trip, but I definitely recommend buying it, it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Awsome product with an awsome price. Just to let those who are looking for a budget camera around this price,this camera have outbeat & outclass the rest of its competitor. Like the usual capturing speed & red eye correction. Trust me ...no other came close Joseph K of RHS
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kok

customer_reviews.title: Lumix Rocks
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this little camera. It is compact but with a zillion features, fairly user friendly and definitely a step up from my last Lumix. After Nikons and Kodaks, i have founf Panasonic's products to be infinitely superior.
customer_reviews.author: Not Funenuf

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Panasonic
customer_reviews.text: I had an older Lumix model that broke simply of over-use and old age (FH37?). It had an autobraketing feature which was very nice to have, especially for a point and shoot. I would normally buy a Canon P&S as they have better image quality than the Panasonics, but wanted the autobracket feature which Canon does not have. Panasonic has removed the autobracket feature from the menu of this new camera, even though the interface is the exact same. Very disappointing Panasonic. It costs nothing extra to put this feature in. No reason to buy Panasonic again for me
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera a month ago, just to replace an Sony Cybershoot 7.1 MP. In a few words PANASONIC it's a very good option if you considered good quality and standar price. Go Panasonic, you are going to love it. Sony still very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos J.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. It doesn't date stamp at will your photos
customer_reviews.text: Everything as I expected of an used 10 years old camera model. Works fine. It doesn't date stamp at will your photos.Unless an special feature that it has, were you can date stamp the photos already taken one at the time in your camera..
customer_reviews.author: Mark Walter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use and picture quality are impressive. The HD video quality is very good and easy to upload to Youtube. There are a lot of options or easy automatic settings. All around great product that rivals any other top brand of camera.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Jesse Rules

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: What an excellent little camera. I was looking for a good camera to capture my 2 year in action and found the perfect camera. I bought a Kodak first and found it to be junk. I am happy with this little camera for my novice use and limited budget!
customer_reviews.author: kmbere

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic lumix, a compact camera
customer_reviews.text: I believe this camera excels all cameras that I have owned including the G7. reason, its simple to use, highly compact and with fantastic results, i paid USD 150.99 and that beats any other cameras price of its qualities.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: My second Panasonic
customer_reviews.text: I just love this point and shoot. I have bought two of them and recommended them to my friends, menus are intuitive so it's easy to use, takes great pics and fits in your pocket. Keeps its charge a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: this was the replacement for my Nikon CoolPix, which had a lot of noise in the low light situations and never lived up to the Nikon reputation. love the long optical zoom on this Lumix, as well as the OIS. sharp image in all lighting situations.
customer_reviews.author: ThunderClaps

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple, small, good quality, easy to use digital camera that did not cost an arm and a leg, had great battery life and took high resolution pictures to take on a long vacation. I found it in this camera. I have put it through the paces and it performed better than expected. The fact that it cost less than I was originally budgeted for it made it all the better. And I still am learning to use its more sophisticated settings and features that will come in handy on my next vacation...besides already using it for work and making it earn its keep!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Seibert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera in this price range!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera early in the year for every day use. The picture quality is excellent. It works great with my Macbook. I have been able to take some great pictures while traveling and now I carry it in my purse all the time in case something interesting comes up. I recently joined the local photography club and plan to use this camera until I learn enough to make it worthwhile to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value and product for the price...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed w/ the Ai feature, the quick shutter speeds and diff. modes. To be fair, I wrongly put it up against my older Canon SD model so this product started w/ a negative score. That is until I started aggressively using it and it has surpass the canon 10 over... Good value!
customer_reviews.author: John Flores

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME LITTLE GUY
customer_reviews.text: LOOKING TO DOWNSIZE FROM MY OLYMPUS 520DSLR FOR BIKE TRIPS I CAME ACROSS THIS CAMERA. SIMPLE TO USE, GREAT ZOOM, AMAZING MOVIE FEATURE. IF YOUR INTO CAMERAS AND TAKING PICTURES THIS IS A GREAT ADDITION TO YOUR NEEDS. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Costantino

customer_reviews.title: Easy use quality photo camera
customer_reviews.text: even the technologically challenged can take great pics with this camera. Feature we were looking for is the ability to take a photo in a shadowy area and have it come out clear and bright. Excellent camera for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: I love the camera.  Large screen on the back.
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera. User friendly. The screen on the back is large. The buttons are user-friendly. Learning to use the camera is also simple. It is a very user-friendly camera. I would recommend this camera to anyone age 13 and above.
customer_reviews.author: RhondaMast

customer_reviews.title: My review
customer_reviews.text: I used to own a Panasonic TZ4 (until it was stolen). I like how this camera fits in my pocket better, but it still has a powerful zoom. My two biggests dislikes about this camera is the lack of zoom adjustment when recording video (pretty common complaint), and the lack of photo controls. My TZ4 had an ISO-max feature, which would set an ISO ceiling that the camera wouldn't exceed, but it still allowed the camera to select a lower iso setting if there was enough lighting. My FH20 seems to only allow auto ISO, or for the user to fix one ISO setting. I think this camera is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kong

customer_reviews.title: Glad I made the decision.
customer_reviews.text: After reading about 100 different camera reviews I decided to go ahead and get this one. I saw that it was $60 cheaper refurbished and was initially apprehensive about taking the risk, but Im glad I did. This camera came in all it's original packaging and looks like its brand new. I'm so happy. I was gonna buy the Samsung Dual-screen TL225 but thought that would be a bigger risk.. This is great. Get it if you want a crystal clear camera that records video in HD and takes poster size pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Marc L

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my son for Christmas based on reviews and looks. From what he has said so far this is a pretty nice camera. Takes good pictures and is nice and compact. Can't beat the price either!!
customer_reviews.author: K. J. K.

customer_reviews.title: Love This Camera
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the quality of this camera and the quality of the pictures. This camera has a lot of modes to use for the type of shot you are taking. I have tried various ones but the intelligent photo shot has always come out great. I have always bought Kodak and Canon and paid more for them and the quality of the pictures were not as good as this camera plus they were bigger and hard to fit in a pocket or purse. So far I LOVE this Camera.
customer_reviews.author: CAROL BOYCE

customer_reviews.title: Way beyond what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This camera was more than we expected. We used it everyday for two weeks in Europe and loved how easy it was to use. The low light photos were excellent. Far better than any other camera we've ever had. The battery lasted plenty long -- again better than other cameras.
customer_reviews.author: tsmith77

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera for the price. Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this camera a few weeks ago and so far I love it. The quality of the pictures is far better than any other camera on the market. If you an amateur photographer who loves to get out and take pictures, without having to lug a huge around camera around then is the perfect one for you. The only drawback to this camera is that you cannot zoom in and out while you're taking video, but other than that this is a great camera for the price. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Vince Garcez

customer_reviews.title: Looks great so far.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one of these for my dad. He thinks its a great camera and so do I. I took a couple of sample pictures and the picture quality is great. 8x Optical Zoom really helps as well.
customer_reviews.author: Spore

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This was my first point and shoot camera to buy in about 8 years, so it was DEFINITELY going to be better, but this thing is phenominal! I love the zoom, and the pictures are CRYSTAL CLEAR!
customer_reviews.author: Benjones

customer_reviews.title: Lumix Camera
customer_reviews.text: Panasonic Lumix Camera was a gift purchase and it arrived on time as agreed. I've been told the camera works great with no complaints. It's very easy to use and set up for the up loading of the picture to the computer is easy.
customer_reviews.author: M W

customer_reviews.title: <3 AMAZING CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera I used! I researched for a long long time before I purchased this camera, I am soo happy with its performance. This camera is fast, I can catch moments that I used to miss with my old camera, like my sister pouring water on my cousin ( I actually caught a picture of the water in mid air!!) The flash works great too! It lights up the whole scene as oppose to just a face or object! And the price can not be beat for the quality of the camera. I am such a bargain shopper, and this camera is a great deal!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JingleBell

customer_reviews.title: LUMIX FH20
customer_reviews.text: This little camera is great for me...point and shoot...easy to use, but also has lots of options for a variety of pix as well as video...good quality pictures...small and light weight enough for me to carry in my purse all the time...very handy. After a lot of research, I'm glad I chose this Panasonic...perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Planeta

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to use point & shoot
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Got it for my mother and she learned to use it quickly. iAuto mode is awesome and takes care of most requirements. Great pictures. Overall an excellent value for money camera.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: awesome camera for the price...move aside nikon and canon
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing little camera. I was really interested in getting the zs7 but didn't feel like spending another 100. I still wouldn't mind getting that camera but so far this camera does the job amazingly well. Low light pictures are awesome. It autofocuses really fast.
customer_reviews.author: riz

customer_reviews.title: super duty
customer_reviews.text: ilove this product, its very good, the pay is just for de quality, i am happy form my desicion. congratullations
customer_reviews.author: Jonahtan Navas

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the many features that come with this model. Not too easy to use but exciting to explore. Should have more details especially on " Q.MENU "
customer_reviews.author: MikeO

customer_reviews.title: Worked good till I tossed it on my seat and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked good till I tossed it on my seat and the charger poked a hole in the LCD making the camera useless :(
customer_reviews.author: Computer_Dr

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about cameras and this is my first digital camera. I've been very happy and impressed with the picture and video quality that this camera puts out. The camera is a nice size and fits easily in my pocket. The battery has very good life and charges quickly. My only complaint is that when I zoom in, pictures are easily blurry but maybe I haven't turned on the image stabilizer. Like I said, great camera and as a first camera for a novice, I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Burgess Donald

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size and features of this camera. The functions are easy to use. I have not used the video yet. Good picture resolution. So far I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: flowerlady

customer_reviews.title: digital camera
customer_reviews.text: I find the ease of use not as easy as my old Casio camera so in time and with practice I'll probably enjoy it - the picture quality is great but the use of the video is a little awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebephylinday

customer_reviews.title: Still better than any IPhone and the settings are easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Still better than any IPhone and the settings are easy to figure out and adjust. Lots of camera for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Koenigs

customer_reviews.title: but takes good pix.
customer_reviews.text: It has a delay to the picture being taken, but takes good pix.
customer_reviews.author: C. Crisp

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great zoom and a wealth of features, we are super-pleased with this camera! The Intelligent Auto (IA) feature makes picture taking a snap and I used a dozen different scene types to create some really nice shots of our Christmas tree last night. The video is clean and crisp and we are just scratching the surface of this device.
customer_reviews.author: Tania D. Carey

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20K 14.1 MP Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera. Pictures come out great and can be blown up many times. Love the zoom features and the video capabilitites.
customer_reviews.author: UNCFAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Video Quality
customer_reviews.text: Grea Video Quality- HD and even when I zoom in it still comes out fantastic. I don't quite feel the photos work the same with the zoom. For some reason the pictures are a little pixelated when I zoom in all the way, but the videos are not. I'm not sure the technicality of why the zoom works better with the video than with the photos, but it doesn't stop me from loving this camera. It's still FAR better than any other zoom camera I've used.
customer_reviews.author: chachacharmin

customer_reviews.title: Great Pictures
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first point and click camera and so far I have no complaints. It's small, light, and takes great pictures with vibrant colors and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, outstanding price.
customer_reviews.text: I have traveled the USA with this camera and emailed my pictures all over. Everyone says they are incredible. Great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Martie

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix Camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is very good, takes very good pictures is easy to use, very light, the battery last a long time and is easy to see how much life is left, Charging the battery is very easy. Joe
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this based on reading several positive reviews on it. We love it! We are very happy about the picture quality and the ease of switching from picture to video. Highly recommended camera for day to day pictures and vacations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera sight unseen for my wife. It was delivered at my home while I was away. By the time I returned home, my wife was raving about the EASE of use of this camera. She is taking pictures like a pro. Many lectures are close up shots of birds in our bushes and trees. This camera is absolutely great!
customer_reviews.author: Henning Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little camera!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at every single camera in this price range & the reviews/numbers didn't lie. Happily the camera didn't either. The software is also top shelf & easy to use. Totally jazzed & satisfied. Recommend this? Oh Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Dondo

customer_reviews.title: great little camera
customer_reviews.text: This is just what the Dr ordered. A great little camera to take everywhere, everyday. When the big digital SLR wants to stay safe at home, off I go with the Lumix!!
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: As a first time Digital Camera experience, I'm blown away that it's a dream...researched thoroughly and feel that I got the perfect one...easy to use and excellent quality pix...still and video...only small complaint is:can't record video with insufficient light indoors...
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: very good camera, not the best one, good value
customer_reviews.text: very good camera, not the best one, good value, solid made, battery life is very decent, video quality is very good (.MOV format),8x optical zoom & 14 megapixels is defintly a plus, outdoor pictures are great, nevertheless, i really dont like the quality of inndors & night pictures, like on a party or landscape,quality of video, sharpness & colors decreases a LOT....
customer_reviews.author: Jean Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Love that camera
customer_reviews.text: I am enamored of my new panasonic camera. It has high quality sharpness and well worth the price. I am recommending it to all my friends who need a camera. There are many additional features that make it even more enjoyable. F.E. the camera can be changed to take black and white pics. I have not yet tried the video part of the camera but Im sure that I will be pleased with this too.
customer_reviews.author: Linny

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic
customer_reviews.text: I saw one of these some time ago and have been looking for an affordabile one. When I saw this one, I snapped it up. It fulfils or exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Father H. R. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy on camera
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy on the camera. I dropped and broke the last one I had and wanted one just like it. I had a hard time finding the same camera in stores. This was a prefect solution. It was reconditioned but works great. I had purchased an extra battery for my original and wanted to be able to use it. The seller shipped very quickly. In all a very good buying experience.
customer_reviews.author: cinCC

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for your dollar. takes great pictures and is easy to use. My wife uses it all the time to capture our two young kids in action.
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a small point and shoot that had a good zoom and this seems to be meeting our needs,
customer_reviews.author: M. Soltis

customer_reviews.title: great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Took this camera on vacation. It took great pictures. The videos were great. Just had a little problem trying to figure settings since I'm not a camera whiz. But overall it's a great compact camera with nice pictures and long battery usage.
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: With cameras, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I researched this a lot, but am ultimately disappointed (especially now that the camera broke after only 5 months). Even when it was working, the picture quality was only so-so, with the autofocus only working effectively about 1/2 the time. Also, not having zoom when video is running is annoying (video quality itself is much better than picture quality, though). Also annoying is that it takes several clicks of small buttons to switch from still photo to video mode. Why can't there just be one dedicated button for that switch of functions? Next time, I'll spend more to get a better camera . . .
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Wayte

product_meta.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20K 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 8x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFROM THE MANUFACTURER
This Stylish Compact Does It All from Wide-angle to Zooming 



28mm Wide-angle Lens
The 28mm wide-angle lens* lets you easily capture large groups of people indoors or expansive architectural structures and scenes with dynamic width and rich perspective, even from short distances.
* Converted to standard 35mm camera equivalent, at the maximum wide position. Powerful 8x Optical Zoom
The DMC-FH20 sports a powerful 8x optical zoom lens (35mm camera equivalent: 28-224mm). This gives you highly natural expressions from people and animals that you can't get close to. And its slim, compact, pocket-sized body can easily go wherever you do for both everyday snapshots and traveling. 
iA (Intelligent Auto) Mode
When you don't know which mode will give you the best shooting results, or when a sudden photo opportunity pops up and you don't have time to make any settings, simply choose iA (Intelligent Auto) Mode by simply pressing the dedicated button and let the camera do it all for you. You just choose iA Mode, aim at your subject, and shoot. 4 detection and correction functions are simultaneously activated to optimize the settings, so you get stunning photos every time. 

HD Movie Recording (1,280 x 720 pixels at 30 fps in Motion JPEG Format)
The DMC-FH20) can record motion images in high-definition (1,280 x 720 pixels at 30 fps in Motion JPEG format). The pixel mixed readout method enables bright motion-image recording even in low-light settings. The DMC-FH20 can also record full-size motion images in WVGA (848 x 480 pixels at 30 fps) or standard motion images in VGA (640 x 480 pixels at 30 fps) and QVGA (320 x 240 pixels at 30 fps). 

Extended Battery Life
The energy-saving Venus Engine IV image-processing engine and the efficient, rechargeable lithium-ion battery which has been slimmed down to fit into thinner camera bodies work together to extend the shooting time of the DMC-FH20. This lets users take approx. 300 shots on a single battery charge*.
* Based on the CIPA standard.
feature_bullets: 8X optical zoom (4X digital zoom/32X total zoom)
Sonic Speed AF for quick focusing on moving subjects

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars313 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
